eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.listeners

Class PetModuleListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.listeners.PetModuleListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class PetModuleListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    A listener to catch events, related to the standalone pet module.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PetModuleListener()
      Loads and initializes all data for the standalone pet module.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDeath(org.bukkit.event.entity.PlayerDeathEvent event)
      Unsummons the active pet after the player dies.

      void onEntityInteraction(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEntityEvent event)

      Handles the interaction between players and pet eggs.

      Handles possible interactions with inventory pet items.
      void onLogout(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerQuitEvent event)
      Unsummons the active pet before logging out a player.
      void onMythicDeath(io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.api.bukkit.events.MythicMobDeathEvent event)
      Removes a player from the owner map, in case their pet dies.
      void onMythicDespawn(io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.api.bukkit.events.MythicMobDespawnEvent event)
      Removes a player from the owner map, in case their pet despawns.
